name: Pochita Fling
description:
| Available as a Browser Game | Downloadable for Windows & Android! |

Check out how the game was made here!


Everyone loves POCHITA.  So, here's a fun little survival game starring him. Fling Pochita around to dodge and attack strategically, and see how high of a score you can get! Choose one of 21 snazzy skins to suit your style, featuring some beloved characters from the show like Denji & Power, Kiryu & Majima from the Yakuza series, or even... Mr. Beast??? 

Controls: Mouse = Aim, Left Click = Pull back / Fling
